name: countries
description: * Login page (only UI)     - Login and Password inputs (both are validated, password - min 5 characters)  *  All countries     - Allow searching for a country (validated - only string)     - Allow to add/remove the country to/from favorites  * Favorites     - List of the countries that the user added to favorites     - Allow to add/remove the country to/from favorites   * Country     - Allow getting info about each country.
author: Naira Yeghiazaryan
